text: @JoshNBCNews Is this the same anti-viral medicine China gave their “walking-well” who dropped dead? I read, China Heath officials, said it was actually the anti-viral drugs damaging the heart which was killing the walking-well from covid19. Anyone read more on whether this is fact or fiction?
